title: Electoral Process (Local Government By-Elections) (Election Date and Time of Poll) (No. 3) Order, 2022
content:
3rd June, 2022 Statutory Instruments 807
GOVERNMENT OF ZAMBIA
STATUTORY INSTRUMENT NO. 38 OF 2022
The Electoral Process Act, 2016
(Act No. 35 of 2016)
Electoral Process (Local Government By-Elections)
(Election Date and Time of Poll) (No. 3) Order, 2022.
IN EXERCISE of the powers contained in Section 125 of the
Electoral Process Act, 2016, the following Order is made:
1. This Order may be cited as the Electoral Process (Local Title
Government By-Elections) (Election Date and Time of Poll)
(No. 3) Order, 2022.
2. A candidate for election as Councillor in a District and Date and
time of
Ward set out in the schedule shall lodge a nomination with the nomination
Returning Officer on Tuesday, 7th June, 2022, between 0900 for election
hours and 1500 hours.
3. The campaign period shall commence on Tuesday, 7th Campaign
period
June, 2022 at 1500 hours and close at 1800 hours on Wednesday,
29th June, 2022.
4. (1) The poll for the election of councillor in a District and Election date
and time of
Ward set out in the schedule shall take place on Thursday, 30th
poll
June, 2022, between 0600 hours and 1800 hours.
(2) A poll shall not be taken in a District and Ward if only
one candidate is validly nominated.
Copies of this Statutory Instrument can be obtained from the Government Printer,
P.O. Box 30136, 10101, Lusaka, Price K4.00 each
808 Statutory Instruments 3rd June, 2022
